alert.note: Alert for Hall; Merrick; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:28AM CDT until July 29 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR NANCE...WESTERN YORK...HAMILTON...MERRICK...WESTERN POLK... EASTERN HOWARD AND EASTERN HALL COUNTIES... At 627 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cedar Rapids to near Archer to Trumbull, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. At 625 AM CDT, a 60 mph wind gust was reported at the Grand Island Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Central City around 635 AM CDT. Clarks and Hordville around 645 AM CDT. Polk around 655 AM CDT. Genoa around 700 AM CDT. Stromsburg around 710 AM CDT. Benedict around 715 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 303 and 349. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
